metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3857 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in libpng 1.6.38. A crafted PNG image can lead to a segmentation fault and denial of service in png_setup_paeth_row() function.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> no upstream fix available as of 2023-02-07

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
libpng1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
